name: stampit
description: Create objects from reusable, composable behaviors.

scripts.cov: npx --yes c8 --reporter html node --run test && open ./coverage/index.html
scripts.build: rm -rf ./out stampit.min.js && node --run minify && node --run replace-version
scripts.ci: node --run test && node --run lint && node --run test:benchmark
scripts.minify: uglifyjs ./stampit.js -c collapse_vars,evaluate=false,unsafe,loops=false,keep_fargs=false,pure_getters,unused,dead_code,keep_fnames=["'stampit','Stamp'"] -m reserved=['stampit','Stamp'] -o ./stampit.min.js && ls -l ./stampit.min.js && echo GZIP size: && gzip-size --raw ./stampit.min.js
